mapper.select: select e.item_id , e.commodity_id , e.evaluate , e.create_time , e.evaluate_id , e.user_id , u.user_name , u.user_image from shop_commodity_evaluate e left join user_info u on u.uid = e.user_id where commodity_id = #{commodityId} and e.status = 0 and u.status = 0 LIMIT #{pageNum-1},#{pageSize}
